name: Flexible Progressive Builder
description: A 4-6 week program that adapts to your available training time. Uses relative week positioning for seamless scaling between 4, 5, or 6 weeks. Starts with a foundation phase focusing on aerobic base, progresses through a development phase with increased intensity, and peaks with maximum power output. Perfect for short training blocks or fitting training around busy schedules.
author: CardioKinetic

weeks.description: Establish baseline and movement quality. Focus on consistent effort rather than peak output.
Progressive overload begins. Push harder during work intervals while maintaining form.
Maximum performance week. Give your best effort on every interval.
